custom.name: myapp
custom.notes: in this version i did this

common.name: TOPHAT
common.description: A wrapper script to run TOPHAT (which uses Bowtie) to do fast short read alignment against a reference sequence
common.notes: Uses Tophat v 0.1.12 and Bowtie v 0.12.2

common.name: eland2ace.pl
common.description: Convert Eland output sorted.txt file into an .ace file

common.name: indexReads
common.description: Index SAM files by read name

common.name: image2eland.pl
common.description: Process images into base calls with Bustard and align reads against reference sequence with Eland

common.name: MAQ
common.description: Align to reference and predict SNPs.

common.name: SAV
common.notes: Call SNPs in pileup format from .SAM or .BAM file generated for each chromosome of the target species (DEFAULT: human hg19). Annotates using user-specified dbSNP (DEFAULT: dbsnp130)

common.name: filterSNP
common.description: Filter SNPs by quality, coverage, etc.

common.name: sleep
common.description: Run test.pl to sleep and print to stdout file

common.name: FTP
common.description: Download FTP files or web pages from a URL
common.notes: Download all files found in links in a page or raw text file

common.name: replaceString.pl
common.description: Convert .ace file into multiple ace files

common.name: splitace.pl
common.description: Convert a single .ace file into multiple ace files, one for each contig.

common.name: jbrowseFeatures
common.description: Generate JBrowse features for all chromosomes in parallel

groups.notes: Admin users and others with special privileges

stageparameters.name: junctions
stageparameters.description: A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.

stageparameters.name: junctions
stageparameters.description: A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.

sharedparameters.name: reference
sharedparameters.description: Location of indexed reference file  (NB: Use file stub, e.g., /some/path/hg19)

sharedparameters.name: coverage
sharedparameters.description: A UCSC BedGraph wigglegram track, showing the depth of coverage at each position, including the spliced read alignments.

sharedparameters.name: hits
sharedparameters.description: A list of read alignments in SAM format. SAM is a compact short read alignment format that is increasingly being adopted.

sharedparameters.name: junctions
sharedparameters.description: A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.

sharedparameters.name: distance
sharedparameters.description: The  mean inner distance between first read and its mate pair (corresponds to -r/--mate-inner-dist argument to Tophat)

sharedparameters.name: inputfiles
sharedparameters.description: Comma-separated *sequence.txt file names (e.g., s_1_1_sequence.txt,s_2_1_sequence.txt)

sharedparameters.name: matefiles
sharedparameters.description: Comma-separated *sequence.txt mate file names (e.g., s_1_2_sequence.txt,s_2_2_sequence.txt) with locations as paths relative to the output directory
